title: Are there champions who get the best of both world?
body: Meaning they have lane dominance in the early game, and are still quite powerful in late game team fights. In other words, they are good at all stages of the game. Back in the old days, the general rule of thumb was that if your champion sucked in the laning phase, he/she would be a late game monster, and if your champ was a lane bully, he/she would fall off hard late game. For context, see {{champion:80}} and {{champion:30}} .
